Data Name: Land Cover 100 Meter Resolution - Conterminous US, Albers Proj
Metadata: Twenty-one classes of land cover, such as deciduous and evergreen forests, shrubland, orchards, and cropland at a ground resolution of 100 meters. This map layer is comprised of four separate Land Cover files for the conterminous United States, Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Results from time-series analysis of 654,178 Landsat 7 ETM+ images in characterizing global forest extent and change from 2000 through 2012

Data Name: Watershed Boundary Dataset; 12-Digit Watersheds Dissolved to 8-Digit Watersheds
Metadata: This dataset is the digital hydrologic unit boundary layer for the 8-digit subwatershed boundaries for the conterminous United States.
Land cover of pixels that have changed from 2001-2011

Data Name: National Land Cover Data From To Change 2001-2011
Metadata: Raster of pixels with metric of "from" and "to" land cover types
Yearly shapefiles based on fly-overs, that map what areas have been disturbed by forest pests
Shapefiles of gauge data up to water year 20030930
500m raster grid with julian date of day burned. Data comes from MODIS. Data transformed with python script written by Tony. Need username (user) and password (burnt_data) to ftp download.
500m raster grid of land cover type with ~5 classes for forest cover type. Currently only downloaded 2006 data but can get yearly data from 2001-2012

Data Name: USFS regional forest type dataset (need DataBasin Login)
Metadata: Vectorized forest type dataset for US broken in to 6 regions. 28 forest classes exist across conus
